column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Cool sultry atmosphere meets authentic spanish tapas. We enjoyed the Spinach & Manchego-stuffed Mushrooms
column5: and the grilled hanger steak. So croquetas are superior
column6: we literally had to get two orders
column7: but I could have ordered at least 50 more. We had the house red sangria
column8: a full pitcher for $28- you can't beat these freaking prices. Make sure to have a reservation
column9: this place is always poppin off. They will seat and take orders til 9 but stayed open past 10. Get there TODAY.
